SEARCH
Package Helpers.ServerHelpers

Class ActionOrder

java.lang.Object
Helpers.ServerHelpers.ActionOrder
public class ActionOrder extends Object
Helper class that constructs a Message to be sent back to the client as an order acknowledgement.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionOrder

      public ActionOrder(Client client, Cafe cafe, Message messageOut, Message messageIn)
      Creates an ActionOrder object.
      Parameters:
      client - The Client that has placed the order
      cafe - Reference to Cafe for adding new drinks and checking valid drinks
      messageOut - The Message that will be sent to the client
      messageIn - The Message from the client that has placed the order

  • Method Details

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      Checks that the order is valid, if it is valid add drinks to the Cafe and construct order acknowledgement

      private void checkOrderArgLengths()
      Checks that the orderArgs lengths are correct for an order command.

    • checkOrderArgValues

      private void checkOrderArgValues()
      Checks that the orderArgs are correct, error messages set if any checks fail.
    • index 0 - Has to be a number
    • index 1 - Has to be a valid drink

      If a second drink has been ordered

    • index 2 - Has to be 'and'
    • index 3 - Has to be a number
    • index 4 - Has to be a valid drink

    • surroundArgWithQuotesAtIndex

      private String surroundArgWithQuotesAtIndex(int index)
      Surrounds the specified index of orderArgs with single quotes.
      Parameters:
      index - An index number for the argument to be wrapped in single quotes
      Returns:
      A String with single quotes around the indexed argument

      Checks that a String is an integer, returning true if the String can be parsed into an int and false if not.

      Returns:
